sentences.english: He saw only her long chestnut lashes , permeated with shadow and modesty.
sentences.chinese: 他只見到栗色的長睫毛，掩映着幽嫺貞靜的神態。

sentences.english: She had a cultivated mind, and was, generally speaking, rational and consistent;
sentences.chinese: 她心性嫺雅，一般說來也很明智，堅定。

sentences.english: he was skilful at sketching. Suddenly, Abe suggested to go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 他素描畫得很嫺熟，突然，艾貝提議去滑雪。

sentences.english: The smith forged the plow with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 那鐵匠技術嫺熟地鍛造馬的蹄鐵。

sentences.english: She has a quiet dignity about her.
sentences.chinese: 她身上有一種嫺靜的高貴氣質。

sentences.english: I fear thy kisses, gentle maiden ;
sentences.chinese: 嫺雅的少女，我憂懼你的親吻。

sentences.english: She was the example of maiden modesty and grace.
sentences.chinese: 她是少女端莊嫺雅的楷模。

sentences.english: Perhaps both of Tagore and Zhang are inarticulate people.
sentences.chinese: 也許張小嫺和泰戈爾都是不善於表達的人。

sentences.english: I was greatly impressed by the handiness with which she played the piano.
sentences.chinese: 她彈奏鋼琴如此嫺熟，給我留下了深刻印象。

sentences.english: The rubble, Zhong Xiaoxian etc. People cant find the fuse, unable to detonate.
sentences.chinese: 碎石瓦礫中，鍾小嫺等人找不到導火索，無法引爆。

sentences.english: You'll be surprised at how adept you become telling your crafting story.
sentences.chinese: 你會驚訝於如何嫺熟成爲你告訴你的故事，並不盡然。

sentences.english: They are skilled wielders of the eastern style composite bow.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林弓箭手對東方式複合弓使用嫺熟。

sentences.english: Pale brows, still hands and dim hair.
The only cure of love is, to love even more.
sentences.chinese: 張小嫺大概也是一個經歷很多的女子。

sentences.english: About his recent artworks, its more proficient and clear of his using materials.
sentences.chinese: 他的近作對材料的使用更加嫺熟也更加透徹。

sentences.english: Ms. Jung declined to comment, but acknowledged the frustration on Thursday's conference call.
sentences.chinese: 鍾彬嫺拒絕置評，但承認週四的電話會議令人沮喪。

definition: (archaic) to present/to bequeath/variant of 貽|贻[yi2]
to reject/to expel/to discard/to exclude/to renounce
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
